metadata.description: DreamWalker MCP - Multi-agent orchestration patterns, LLM provider abstraction, and data fetching utilities via Model Context Protocol.

plugins.name: dreamwalker-mcp
plugins.description: Multi-agent orchestration and LLM provider abstraction via MCP protocol. Includes Dream Cascade hierarchical research, Dream Swarm multi-agent search, 9 LLM providers, and data fetching utilities.

mcpServers.name: Unified Orchestrator
mcpServers.description: Dream Cascade & Dream Swarm orchestration with workflow_checklist utility

mcpServers.name: LLM Providers
mcpServers.description: 9 LLM providers: Anthropic, OpenAI, xAI, Mistral, Cohere, Gemini, Perplexity, Groq, HuggingFace

mcpServers.name: Data Fetching
mcpServers.description: Wikipedia, YouTube, Finance, Weather, GitHub, NASA, News, OpenLibrary clients
